string.value: The Rememberer needs help figuring out what drove the mushrooms into a rage. You should go help.
Once again, the Rememberer suggests that someone should study Zombie Mushrooms.\r\n\r\n#i4000008:# #t4000008:# #c4000008# / 100
You've helped further the study of Zombie Mushrooms.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 8,000\r\nCan proceed to 'Zombie Mushroom Signal 3' quest\r\n

I was thinking… are you sure ‘keck' was exactly how they said it? If I remember it correctly, it sounded a little different. \r\n#b#L0#I don't know… it's not something that I can really duplicate....#l\n#k

I thought that might happen, so I brought this. It's a container that holds and records sounds, but it's incomplete...which means, it needs to be mixed with something that can soak up sounds. And that something is...Charms of the Undead! Get me 100 charms, and I'll convert them into something that can soak up sounds. I need 100 of them!
I am sorry. I must be working you too hard. I understand.
Okay, wait for a bit while I make one for you.
